config.toggle-auto-fishing.tooltip: Press this key to toggle automatic fishing.
config.enable-auto-baiting.tooltip: When enabled, automatically applies bait from inventory when the fishing rod's bait is depleted.
config.enable-auto-tackling.tooltip: When enabled, automatically applies tackle from inventory when the fishing rod's tackle is broken.
config.enable-grab-treasure.tooltip: When enabled, automatically collects items from fishing treasure chests.
config.enable-skip-fish-showing.tooltip: When enabled, skips the fish showing animation after catching a fish.
config.min-stamina-for-auto-fishing.tool: Auto-fishing will be disabled when stamina is below this value.
config.min-catch-count-for-skip-minigame: Minimum Catch Count for Skip Fishing
When a fish's catch count reaches this value, the fishing minigame will be automatically skipped.
config.min-perfect-count-for-skip-miniga: Minimum Perfect Count for Skip Fishing
When a fish's perfect catch count reaches this value, the fishing minigame will be automatically skipped.
config.fish-counter.title: Fishing Statistics
bobber-bar.needed: You need {catchNeeded} more catches and {perfectNeeded} perfect catches to skip fishing minigame for {fishName}.
